title: No Role Challenge

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may attack two players instead each full moon.
- If no roles were posted within 24 hours after this role's post, you can win with all Neutrals.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who has posted a role ever.

desc:
Post 4224
*Okay y'all clearly hate making roles so this should be easy*
